page.description: The UI_SHAPE_RECT() function draws a rectangle into the shape buffer. You can then use the shape buffer:
page.syntax: V UI_SHAPE_RECT(C shape,N x,N y,N width,N height[,C shape_operation])

argument.name: shape
argument.description: The name of a new or existing shape.

argument.name: x
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle. Larger values move right.

argument.name: y
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle. Larger values move down.

argument.name: shape_operation
argument.description: Optional. Default = erase previous shape. An indication of how to combine the shape with other shapes.

item.name: "and" = show only the intersection of the rectangle and any other shapes.
"or" = show both the union of the rectangle and any other shapes.
"xor" = show both the rectangle and any other shapes, but do not show their intersection.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example uses a rectangular shape to limit the drawing region.
section.example: ui_bitmap_load("stone", file.to_blob("C:\WINDOWS\Greenstone.bmp")) ui_bitmap_create("test", 4, 2) ui_shape_rect("rect", 0, 0, 2, 1) ui_bitmap_draw("test", <<%code% inner_rect(0, 0, 4, 2) clip_shape("rect", 1, .5) bitmap("stone", 0, 0, 4, 2) %code%) ui_dlg_box("", "{image=test}")

section.description: This example creates a rectangular shape and draws it onto the bitmap. The border color is set by the current pen. There is no fill.
section.example: ui_bitmap_load("stone", file.to_blob("C:\WINDOWS\Greenstone.bmp")) ui_bitmap_create("test", 4, 2) ui_shape_rect("rect", 0, 0, 2, 1) ui_bitmap_draw("test", <<%code% inner_rect(0, 0, 4, 2) clip_shape("rect", 1, .5) bitmap("stone", 0, 0, 4, 2) %code%) ui_dlg_box("", "{image=test}")

section.description: This example creates a rectangular shape and draws it onto the bitmap. The border color is set by the current pen. There is no fill.

section.example: ui_bitmap_create("test", 4, 2) ui_shape_rect("rect", 0, 0, 2, 1) ui_bitmap_draw("test", <<%code% inner_rect(0, 0, 4, 2) set_pen("black") set_brush("green") shape("rect", 1, .5) %code%) ui_dlg_box("", "{image=test}")

page.limitations: This function is only used in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().
